### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -84.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -84.0) with 50 coal fuel, warnings for no ingredients to smelt and full fuel source.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -82.0) with 43 coal fuel, warnings for no ingredients to smelt.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) with 48 coal fuel, warnings for no ingredients to smelt.

### Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (62.0, -54.0) with 19 coal fuel, warnings for no ingredients to smelt, and 1 stone in the furnace source.

### Lab at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of a lab at position (0.5, 0.5) with 50 automation-science-pack in the lab input, warnings for not receiving electricity, and researching automation.

### Steam Engine at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (5.5, 0.5) with warnings for not being connected to the power network, no input liquid, and no fluid present in connections.

### Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) with a fluid box containing 100 water at 15 temperature, warnings for none, and a working status.

### Pipe Group at position (-0.5, -2.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (-0.5, -2.5) with a full output status, containing water fluid, and connected to multiple pipes.

### Pipe Group at position (5.5, 7.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (5.5, 7.5) with an empty status.

### Pipe Group at position (-0.5, 13.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (-0.5, 13.5) with an empty status.

### Electricity Group at id 6945
Consists of an electricity group with id 6945, containing multiple small electric poles, and a voltage of 0.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure the furnace contains the item to be extracted before attempting extraction.
- Verify the furnace entity and position match the intended furnace before extraction.

### Errors when using entities without proper connections
- Ensure entities like steam engines are connected to the power network and have the necessary input liquids and fluid connections.
- Verify offshore pumps have the necessary pipe connections to function correctly.

### Errors when placing entities without proper space
- Ensure there is enough space to place entities like furnaces, labs, and steam engines without overlapping other entities.
- Verify the tile dimensions and positions of entities to avoid placement errors.
